persona: He seeks care for over two years of gross hematuria. PSA 0.8 ng/mL, MRI: BPH protruding into bladder, right peripheral PI-RADS 3; biopsy shows Gleason 3+3 prostate adenocarcinoma. Hypertension on nifedipine, TIA three years ago.

persona: An 83-year-old man describes several months of lower urinary tract symptoms—frequency, urgency, hesitancy, weak stream—without hematuria or urethral pain. Otherwise well: normal appetite, bowel habits, and sleep, with stable weight, concerned about management.
persona_chinese: 83岁男性，数月来出现下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、排尿等待与尿流弱；无血尿或尿道痛。其余状况良好，食欲、睡眠和排便正常，体重稳定，关注治疗方案。

persona: At 70, he returns for BPH follow-up with new irritative LUTS—urinary frequency, urgency, and increased nocturia. No dysuria, hematuria, flank or abdominal pain, or fever. Prior prostate biopsy confirmed benign hyperplasia.
persona_chinese: 70岁男性复诊，近期出现刺激性下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、夜尿增多。无尿痛、血尿，亦无腰背或腹部疼痛、发热寒战或畏寒。既往前列腺穿刺证实良性增生。

persona: Eighty-three-year-old man, one year after prostate laser enucleation, voiding well without LUTS, now notes a PSA of 8.5 ng/mL. He seeks interpretation and guidance on need for further workup or treatment.
persona_chinese: 83岁男性，前列腺激光剜除术后一年，排尿良好、无下尿路症状；近期体检PSA 8.5 ng/mL，对结果存疑，寻求解释及是否需要进一步评估或治疗的建议。

persona: At 74, he reports progressive hesitancy and a weak urinary stream over recent months; an outside hospital noted prostate enlargement (benign prostatic hyperplasia). He now seeks targeted therapy to relieve lower urinary tract obstruction.
persona_chinese: 他，74岁，近数月出现起尿迟缓、尿流变弱且逐渐加重；外院提示前列腺增大，考虑良性前列腺增生。现寻求缓解下尿路梗阻的针对性治疗方案。

persona: An 82-year-old man reports recent progressive voiding difficulty culminating in acute urinary retention; an outside hospital placed an indwelling Foley. He seeks catheter removal and prostate/urothelial tumor markers to exclude malignancy.
persona_chinese: 82岁男性，近期排尿困难加重并发生急性尿潴留，外院留置Foley导尿管。现希望拔管，并检测前列腺及泌尿系肿瘤标志物以排除恶性病变。

persona: At 59, she developed two days of left flank pain; afternoon fever 39.1°C with nausea and emesis, HR 109. CT shows mid‑left ureteral stone with hydronephrosis and cortical atrophy. Labs: pyuria, neutrophilia (85.6%), platelets 83.
persona_chinese: 59岁女性，左侧腰背痛2天；今下午高热39.1℃，伴恶心呕吐，心率109。CT示左侧输尿管中段结石致上段积水，左肾皮质萎缩。实验室：脓尿，中性粒细胞85.6%，血小板83。

persona: She reports sudden, severe right-sided flank and lumbar pain. No fever or nausea/vomiting; visible hematuria with urination, normal bowel movements—features consistent with renal colic from a ureteral stone.
persona_chinese: 她自述右侧腰背部剧痛骤起。无发热或恶心呕吐；排尿时可见肉眼血尿，排便正常——表现符合肾绞痛，考虑输尿管结石可能。

persona: At 51, he reports recent, severe LUTS—frequency, urgency, hesitancy, weak/narrowed stream, incomplete emptying, nocturia x2. MRI shows BPH (39x54x53 mm); PSA 5.547 ng/mL; PVR 60 mL; IPSS 33.
persona_chinese: 51岁男性，近期重度下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、排尿等待、尿流细弱、排尿不尽，夜尿2次。MRI示前列腺增生（39×54×53 mm）；PSA 5.547 ng/mL；PVR 60 mL；IPSS 33分。

persona: Asymptomatic at 63, he was found two weeks ago to harbor a right mid-renal nodule (~2 cm): partial diffusion restriction, arterial hyperenhancement with venous washout, cortical indentation, slight sinus protrusion, intact capsule—clear cell RCC suspected.
persona_chinese: 63岁，未见症状，两周前发现右肾中部结节（约2厘米）；部分弥散受限，动脉期明显强化、静脉期减弱，伴皮质凹陷与轻度突入肾窦，包膜完整，倾向透明细胞癌。

persona: In his late seventies, a man with years-long lower urinary tract symptoms—hesitancy, weak stream, straining, frequency, urgency, nocturia; afebrile—a pattern strongly suggesting benign prostatic hyperplasia with bladder outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 年近八旬男性，长期下尿路症状：排尿迟缓、尿线细、用力排尿，伴尿频、尿急、夜尿多；体温正常，整体表现高度提示良性前列腺增生并膀胱出口梗阻。

persona: He, 68, has >2 months of PSA elevation (936 ng/mL). MRI: heterogeneous prostate with central nodules and 9–11 o’clock peripheral lesions. Biopsy cores 6–14 malignant, Gleason 4+4=8 (ISUP 4/5); high-risk prostate adenocarcinoma.
persona_chinese: 68岁男性，PSA异常升高逾2月（936 ng/mL）。MRI示前列腺信号不均，中央带结节及外周带9–11点病灶。穿刺6–14针癌变，Gleason 4+4=8，ISUP 4/5，考虑高危前列腺腺癌。

persona: At 87, with a coronary stent and on anticoagulation, he has two years of urinary frequency/urgency, catheter-dependent retention; PSA 234 ng/mL and PET/CT showing prostate cancer invading bladder/rectum with pelvic nodal metastases and bladder stones.
persona_chinese: 他87岁，既往冠脉支架，长期抗凝；两年尿频尿急，现为导尿管依赖的尿潴留；PSA 234 ng/mL；PET/CT示前列腺癌侵犯膀胱/直肠，伴盆腔淋巴结转移及膀胱结石。

persona: At 72, he’s catheter-dependent after 10 days of indwelling Foley for urinary retention with obstructive voiding symptoms. PSA measures 16.47 ng/mL. MRI reveals right peripheral-zone PI-RADS 4 and 3 foci; prior transrectal biopsy benign.
persona_chinese: 72岁男性，排尿梗阻症状明显，因尿潴留留置Foley导尿已10天。PSA 16.47 ng/mL。MRI示右侧外周带PI-RADS 4与3灶；此前经直肠穿刺活检为良性。

persona: At 68, he reports a year of rising PSA and obstructive LUTS: daytime frequency, post-void dribbling, occasional split stream, worse after holding urine; minimal nocturia; no dysuria, hematuria, or fever; partial response to doxazosin and TCM.
persona_chinese: 他，68岁，近一年PSA持续升高；以梗阻性下尿路症状为主：白天尿频、憋尿后排尿困难、偶有尿分叉与滴沥；夜尿0-1次；无尿痛、肉眼血尿或发热；多沙唑辛及中成药后稍有改善。

persona: He’s 79, male, with two weeks of bothersome lower urinary tract symptoms—frequency and urgency. PSA 2.98 ng/mL. Prostate MRI reveals a PI-RADS 4 lesion, heightening concern for clinically significant prostate cancer.
persona_chinese: 他79岁，男性，近半月出现明显下尿路症状——尿频、尿急。PSA 2.98 ng/ml；前列腺MRI示PI-RADS 4级结节，令其担忧可能存在临床意义的前列腺癌。

persona: At 65, he reports recent-onset lower urinary tract symptoms: daytime frequency, urgency, and pronounced post-void residual sensation, with nocturia 3–4 times nightly disrupting sleep—classic mixed storage/voiding pattern, suggestive of benign prostatic hyperplasia.
persona_chinese: 已65岁的他，近期出现下尿路症状：白天尿频、尿急，排尿不尽感明显；夜间起夜3-4次，严重干扰睡眠。贮尿与排尿症状并存，提示良性前列腺增生。

persona: Seventy-year-old man with six months of obstructive LUTS—hesitancy and weak stream. Outside-hospital MRI confirmed BPH; PSA 10.4 ng/mL. On doxazosin, improved further after Youlifu; seeks optimization of medical therapy.
persona_chinese: 70岁男性，半年来出现梗阻性下尿路症状：排尿踌躇、尿流无力。外院MRI证实前列腺增生；PSA 10.4 ng/mL。口服多沙唑嗪，加入优利福后进一步改善，正寻求优化药物治疗。

persona: Two days of right flank pain and 39.9°C fevers. CT: proximal right ureteral stone with hydronephrosis and perinephric stranding. PCT 15.99, CRP 340, platelets 106. HR 107, BP 143/100; diabetic with heart failure/CAD—suspected urosepsis.
persona_chinese: 右腰痛2天，高热至39.9℃。CT示右侧输尿管近段结石，上尿路积水并肾周渗出。PCT 15.99、CRP 340、血小板106；心率107、血压143/100。糖尿病合并心衰/冠心病，倾向尿源性脓毒症。

persona: At 26, she has a two‑month history of incidentally detected left renal angiomyolipoma—upper‑pole 4×8×6 cm, fat‑containing, heterogeneously enhancing, partly exophytic with perinephric fat blurring; asymptomatic yet anxious about hemorrhage risk and treatment.
persona_chinese: 她26岁，体检偶然发现左肾上极血管平滑肌脂肪瘤已两月：4×8×6cm，含脂肪，强化不均，部分外突，肾周脂肪间隙模糊；无症状，但担心出血风险与治疗选择。

persona: Three months post-REZUM for symptomatic BPH, he enjoys a strong urinary stream, minimal urgency, no nocturia, and negligible post-void residual; now asymptomatic, he questions the need for ongoing or additional therapy and appropriate follow-up.
persona_chinese: REZUM水蒸汽热疗治疗BPH后第3个月，他排尿有力，尿急很少，无夜尿，残余尿几乎为零；目前症状基本消失，正询问是否还需继续或追加治疗及随访安排。

persona: Two and a half years after HoLEP, this 75-year-old man reports a persistently bifurcated urinary stream despite strong flow; no incontinence, gross hematuria, urgency, frequency, dysuria, or fever; seeks management advice.
persona_chinese: 前列腺钬激光剜除术（HoLEP）术后两年半的75岁男性，排尿通畅且尿流良好，但持续出现尿线分叉。无尿失禁、肉眼血尿、尿急尿频、排尿疼痛或发热，寻求评估与治疗建议。

persona: Middle-aged man, 51, asymptomatic, with an incidentally detected right renal mass present >1 month. Contrast-enhanced CT shows a ~1 cm enhancing mid-pole cortical lesion (cT1a), prompting surgical planning, likely nephron-sparing resection.
persona_chinese: 51岁男性，无症状，体检偶发右肾占位已1个多月。增强CT示右肾中极约1 cm强化皮质实性病灶（cT1a），拟行外科治疗，优先考虑肾单位保留性部分肾切除。

persona: At 58, he reports recent-onset nocturia, rising 3–4 times nightly. He denies daytime frequency, urgency, or dysuria, suggesting isolated nocturnal lower urinary tract symptoms primarily disrupting sleep rather than voiding comfort.
persona_chinese: 58岁男性，近期出现夜尿增多，每晚起床排尿3–4次；白天无尿频、尿急或尿痛，呈孤立性夜间下尿路症状，主要困扰为睡眠中断。

persona: At 66, PSA 49–50 ng/mL persistently over 3 months; biopsy confirms prostate adenocarcinoma, Gleason 4+3. PET-CT: enlarged, FDG-avid prostate with calcifications. Hypertension 20 years on telmisartan/HCTZ; prior clavicle plate, right hip arthroplasty; no family history.
persona_chinese: 他，66岁，PSA在3个月内持续49–50 ng/mL；活检证实前列腺腺癌，Gleason 4+3。PET-CT示前列腺增大、FDG摄取增高并见钙化。20年高血压，服替米沙坦/氢氯噻嗪；既往锁骨钢板、右髋置换；无家族史。

persona: He is a 67-year-old man with nocturia and a two-year history of left perineal fullness that improves post-void. He denies renal colic, nausea/vomiting, or back/flank pain—consistent with LUTS, suspect BPH or chronic prostatitis.
persona_chinese: 他为67岁男性，夜尿增多；左侧会阴胀满已有2年，排尿后缓解。无肾绞痛、恶心呕吐、腰背或肋腹痛。表现为下尿路症状，倾向前列腺增生或慢性前列腺炎可能。

persona: At 68, one month after HoLEP for obstructive benign prostatic hyperplasia, his urinary stream is strong and effortless, without dysuria. He seeks a clear postoperative plan—medications, pelvic floor recovery, and follow-up testing.
persona_chinese: 68岁男性，术前因良性前列腺增生导致梗阻性下尿路症状；术后1个月完成钬激光剜除术，现尿流强、排尿顺畅、无尿痛。询问后续用药、盆底训练及随访安排。

persona: At 53, he reports progressive LUTS—weak, thin stream, frequency, urgency, incomplete emptying. IPSS 26. Uroflow Qmax 10.9→10.5 mL/s with VOL 265→196 mL; prostate 51.9 mL, PVR 44 mL. Urodynamics: detrusor underactivity plus bladder outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 53岁男性，进行性下尿路症状：尿流细弱、尿频尿急、排尿不尽。IPSS 26分。尿流率Qmax 10.9→10.5 mL/s，排尿量265→196 mL；前列腺约51.9 mL，残余尿44 mL。尿动力：逼尿肌收缩力减弱并伴膀胱出口梗阻。

persona: Male, 58, five days after percutaneous nephrolithotomy, suddenly sees bright-red drainage from his nephrostomy tube. He now struggles to pass urine, feeling obstructed, and fears postoperative renal bleeding with clot retention.
persona_chinese: 患者，男，58岁，术后第5天（经皮肾镜取石术），肾造瘘管突然引流鲜红血液；现小便困难，有阻塞感。担心术后肾出血并血块潴留。

persona: At 43, he reports 3–5 days of glans erythema with intense pruritus. Foreskin is long yet retractable; meticulous daily cleansing hasn’t helped, pointing to balanitis—likely candidal or irritant from occlusive moisture.
persona_chinese: 他43岁，近几天出现龟头发红伴明显瘙痒。包皮偏长但可上翻；每日清洁无效，提示龟头炎，可能为念珠菌性或刺激性，与潮湿、包裹环境相关。

persona: At 66, he describes a year of progressive LUTS: hesitancy with delayed start, weak and slow stream, and occasional incomplete emptying. Nighttime urination 4–5 times with normal volumes points toward BPH-related bladder outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 66岁男性，近一年出现进行性下尿路症状：排尿等待、尿流无力且缓慢，偶有排尿不尽。夜尿4–5次且每次尿量正常，整体指向良性前列腺增生相关的膀胱出口梗阻。

persona: She, 53, notes recent dysuria—acidic aching with micturition—and stress urinary incontinence precipitated by exertion. Afebrile, no chest tightness. Presentation suggests uncomplicated lower urinary tract irritation rather than systemic infection.
persona_chinese: 她53岁，近期出现排尿酸痛（尿痛、排尿时灼酸感），伴用力诱发的压力性尿失禁。无发热、无胸闷；更像下尿路刺激表现，暂不支持全身性感染。

persona: He describes several days of progressively worsening voiding difficulty—urinary hesitancy and weak stream—consistent with lower urinary tract symptoms, raising concern for benign prostatic hyperplasia–related bladder outlet obstruction in a 72-year-old man.
persona_chinese: 他近几日排尿困难逐步加重，尿起始迟缓、尿流无力，符合下尿路症状，令人担忧良性前列腺增生相关的膀胱出口梗阻；男性，72岁。

persona: At 52, he recently learned of benign prostatic hyperplasia on outside evaluation: ultrasound shows mild enlargement with a 26 mL post-void residual; PSA 2.93 ng/mL. Symptoms weren’t detailed, yet he seeks management guidance.
persona_chinese: 52岁男性，近期外院检查发现良性前列腺增生；B超示轻度增大，排尿后残余尿26 mL，PSA 2.93 ng/mL。症状未详述，他对此担忧，寻求治疗方案。

persona: He returns for BPH follow-up at 71, reporting urinary frequency, urgency, and worsening nocturia. PSA 1.67 ng/mL; MRI reveals a prostatic lesion. No dysuria or hematuria; family history of prostate cancer, seeking management advice.
persona_chinese: 他因既往前列腺增生复诊，71岁，近期尿频、尿急、夜尿增多，无尿痛血尿或腰背痛发热。PSA 1.67 ng/mL，MRI示前列腺占位，前列腺癌家族史阳性，寻求治疗方案。

persona: At 57, he reports several weeks of progressively worsening lower urinary tract symptoms—hesitancy, urgency, frequency, and a weak, delayed stream. His IPSS is 22, consistent with severe LUTS, suggesting benign prostatic obstruction.
persona_chinese: 57岁男性，他近月来下尿路症状进行性加重：排尿困难、尿急尿频，起尿迟且尿流细。IPSS 22分，属重度，倾向良性前列腺梗阻。

persona: At 72, he developed acute urinary retention requiring an indwelling Foley. A trial without catheter at 7 days failed; re-catheterized for two weeks, he seeks definitive options to resolve persistent retention and regain independent voiding.
persona_chinese: 72岁男性，急性尿潴留需留置导尿。7天拔管试验失败，随后再次留置2周；他担忧持续潴留，咨询可恢复自主排尿的明确治疗方案与下一步管理。

persona: Young woman, 24, with a 3-month incidental left renal mass (~25×21 mm) near the hilum: mild FDG uptake, arterial enhancement/venous washout, intralesional fat on MRI; bilateral small fat nodules; veins clear; pathology pending—ccRCC vs angiomyolipoma; possible microscopic pedicle nodes.
persona_chinese: 24岁女性，体检偶发现左肾近肾门肿块约25×21mm已3月；PET轻度FDG增高，CT动脉期强化/静脉期洗脱；MRI示病灶内脂肪信号、强化不均；双肾多发小脂肪结节；左肾静脉/下腔静脉通畅；病理待定，透明细胞癌与AML待鉴别，肾蒂微小淋巴结转移不能除外。

persona: At 69, he reports a two-year history of progressive lower urinary tract symptoms—hesitancy, weak/thin stream, nocturia, frequency, and urgency—without dysuria, seeking evaluation for suspected BPH-related bladder outlet obstruction and treatment options.
persona_chinese: 69岁，他自述两年来下尿路症状进行性加重：排尿迟缓、尿流细弱、夜尿增多、尿频与尿急，无尿痛；为疑似前列腺增生导致的膀胱出口梗阻前来就诊并咨询治疗方案。

persona: A septuagenarian man with many years of progressive LUTS—urinary hesitancy, weak stream, straining, frequency, urgency, and prominent nocturia—remains afebrile, suggesting benign prostatic hyperplasia without infection, and seeks management options.
persona_chinese: 高龄男性，长期进展性的下尿路症状：起尿迟缓、尿流变细、用力排尿、尿频、尿急及明显夜尿；体温正常，倾向良性前列腺增生而非感染，现寻求治疗方案。

persona: He’s concerned about a month-long PSA rise after two weeks of bicalutamide. Post-TURP pathology: acinar adenocarcinoma, Gleason 4+5=9, ~70% involvement. FDG-avid prostate; iliac nodes. MRI: bulky gland with BPH calcifications; incidental liver cysts, bone islands.
persona_chinese: 他因PSA持续升高逾一月而担忧，曾服比卡鲁胺2周。TURP后病理示腺泡腺癌，Gleason 4+5=9，肿瘤约70%。FDG摄取增高、髂旁淋巴结；MRI示饱满腺体伴BPH钙化；伴肝囊肿、骨岛。

persona: Age 26, male with lifelong redundant foreskin notes a two-day surge of whitish subpreputial discharge and glans discomfort; concerned about early balanitis from smegma accumulation and seeking appropriate treatment guidance.
persona_chinese: 这位26岁男性，长期包皮过长，近两天包皮下白色分泌物明显增多并伴龟头不适；担心因包皮垢堆积引发早期龟头炎/包皮龟头炎，正寻求合适的治疗建议。

persona: Elderly man, 78, with acute-onset voiding difficulty persisting >24 hours after removal of an indwelling urinary catheter; persistent dysuria without relief raises concern for post-catheter urinary retention or bladder outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 78岁男性，拔除留置尿管后超过24小时仍持续排尿困难，症状未缓解；表现提示拔管后尿潴留或膀胱出口梗阻的可能性。

persona: He, 61, recently had screening revealing PSA 7.234 ng/mL with a free-to-total PSA ratio of 14%. No reported urinary symptoms; he fears malignancy risk and seeks guidance on further workup and management.
persona_chinese: 他为61岁男性，近期体检PSA 7.234 ng/ml，f/TPSA 14%。未诉尿路症状，担忧前列腺恶性风险，期望获得进一步诊断评估与治疗建议。

persona: She is a 34-year-old woman with a >6-month incidental left renal mass: imaging shows a fat-containing upper-pole lesion (−75–42 HU; MRI 58×37 mm), highly suggestive of renal angiomyolipoma, plus bilateral renal cysts; asymptomatic.
persona_chinese: 34岁女性，体检偶发现左肾占位逾半年；影像示上极含脂病灶（CT −75–42 HU，MRI 58×37 mm），考虑肾血管平滑肌脂肪瘤，伴双肾囊肿；无症状。

persona: Attending follow-up for benign prostatic hyperplasia, this 65-year-old man reports storage-predominant LUTS—frequency, urgency, and marked nocturia. Denies dysuria, gross hematuria, flank/back pain, fever/chills, or abdominal pain/distension.
persona_chinese: 65岁男性，前列腺增生复诊，近期以储尿期下尿路症状为主：尿频、尿急，夜尿显著增加。否认尿痛、肉眼血尿、腰背或肋区痛、发热寒战及腹痛腹胀。

persona: He underwent laser vaporization for BPH six months ago; voiding normalized post-catheter, but three weeks later developed weak, non-linear stream with poor force and urinary incontinence. Last month: urethral stricture; dilation gave little relief.
persona_chinese: 他半年前接受前列腺增生的激光汽化术，拔管后排尿通畅；三周后尿流变细且分叉、尿力差并失禁。上月诊断尿道狭窄，行扩张，疗效有限。

persona: At 65, he seeks guidance after PSA 5.56 ng/mL, fPSA 1.06, ratio 0.19; MRI shows BPH with prostatitis and a PI-RADS 3 apex left transition-zone nodule, stable versus prior; recent biopsy benign hyperplasia.
persona_chinese: 65岁男性，因PSA升高（5.56 ng/ml，游离1.06，f/t比值0.19）来咨询；影像示前列腺增生伴炎症，尖部左侧移行带PI-RADS 3结节，较前稳定；近期穿刺证实良性增生，询问治疗方案。

persona: One year after prostate laser enucleation for BPH, this 83-year-old man voids well but reports a PSA of 8.5 ng/mL on screening, asking if treatment is warranted and which options.
persona_chinese: 前列腺激光剜除术后一年，这位83岁男性排尿顺畅、无明显下尿路症状；体检PSA 8.5 ng/mL，对术后升高存疑，咨询是否需要干预及可选方案。

persona: A 67-year-old man with established benign prostatic hyperplasia presents for follow-up, noting recent lower urinary tract storage symptoms—frequency, urgency, and worsening nocturia—without dysuria, hematuria, flank/abdominal pain, fever, or chills, seeking management options.
persona_chinese: 67岁男性，既往良性前列腺增生，现复诊；近期出现下尿路贮尿症状：尿频、尿急、夜尿加重。否认尿痛、血尿、腰腹痛及发热寒战，前来寻求治疗方案。

persona: At 75, he returns for BPH follow-up with storage-predominant LUTS—urinary frequency, urgency, and marked nocturia—absent dysuria, hematuria, abdominal/flank pain, or infectious signs; seeking guidance on management.
persona_chinese: 75岁男性前来前列腺增生复诊，近期以储尿期症状为主：尿频、尿急、夜尿明显增多；无尿痛、血尿、腹痛或腰部不适，亦无发热寒战；询求治疗建议。

persona: She, 53, struggles with refractory hypertension (≈150/105) despite metoprolol, hydrochlorothiazide, and amlodipine. Two weeks ago, CT found a 21‑mm right adrenal nodule with moderate enhancement, no lymphadenopathy—adenoma suspected; hysteroscopic myomectomy in 2017; seeking guidance.
persona_chinese: 她，53岁，顽固性高血压（≈150/105），长期服用美托洛尔、氢氯噻嗪、氨氯地平。两周前CT示右侧肾上腺21mm结节，中度强化、密度均匀，后腹膜未见淋巴结肿大，倾向腺瘤；2017年行宫腔镜子宫肌瘤切除，现寻求治疗建议。

persona: At 87, he reports 2 years of urinary frequency/urgency, now retention with indwelling catheter; PSA 234 ng/mL; PET-CT: prostate cancer invading bladder/rectum with pelvic nodal spread, bladder stones; CAD stent on anticoagulation, seeking treatment guidance.
persona_chinese: 他87岁，近2年尿频尿急，现已尿潴留需留置导尿；PSA 234 ng/mL；PET-CT示前列腺癌侵犯膀胱/直肠并盆腔淋巴结转移，伴膀胱结石；冠心病支架，长期抗凝，现求治疗方案。

persona: An 82-year-old man with acute urinary retention necessitating an indwelling Foley catheter at an outside facility; reports voiding difficulty suggestive of bladder outlet obstruction. He seeks catheter removal and prostate cancer evaluation, including PSA.
persona_chinese: 82岁男性，近期急性尿潴留，在外院留置导尿；近来排尿困难，考虑膀胱出口梗阻。他希望拔除导尿管，并进行前列腺肿瘤评估，包括PSA检测。

persona: At 72, he developed marked voiding difficulty progressing to retention; an indwelling catheter for ten days. PSA 16.47 ng/mL. MRI shows right peripheral zone PI-RADS 4 lesion plus a PI-RADS 3 focus; prior biopsy benign.
persona_chinese: 72岁男性，近期排尿困难加重至尿潴留，已留置导尿10天。PSA 16.47 ng/ml。MRI示右侧外周带PI-RADS 4结节，另有PI-RADS 3灶；此前前列腺穿刺示良性。

persona: He seeks care for right-sided flank pain and scant urine over 48 hours; CT confirms bilateral proximal ureteral stones with hydronephrosis. Labs: WBC 15.6, neutrophils 83%, CRP 91, creatinine 865, pH 7.28—obstructive AKI suspected.
persona_chinese: 他因右侧腰痛伴尿量减少48小时前来就医；CT证实双侧输尿管上段结石并积水。化验：白细胞15.6、N%83%、CRP91、肌酐865、pH7.28，考虑梗阻性急性肾损伤。

persona: At 74, he reports progressively worsening voiding difficulty; an outside facility diagnosed prostatic enlargement consistent with BPH. He seeks guidance on relieving LUTS through medications or minimally invasive options to improve quality of life.
persona_chinese: 74岁男性，近期出现进行性排尿困难；外院诊断前列腺增大，考虑良性前列腺增生。他希望了解缓解下尿路症状的治疗选择（如药物或微创手术），以改善生活质量。

persona: He, 70, returns after biopsy-proven benign prostatic hyperplasia. Recent lower urinary tract symptoms—frequency, urgency, nocturia—without dysuria, hematuria, lumbar/flank pain, fever or chills; no abdominal pain or distension.
persona_chinese: 他，70岁，前次穿刺证实良性前列腺增生，此次复诊。近期出现下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、夜尿增多；无尿痛、血尿、腰部疼痛或酸胀、发热寒战，亦无腹痛腹胀。

persona: She reports a recent, sudden onset of intense right flank and lumbar pain with visible hematuria on voiding. Afebrile, without nausea or vomiting, and bowel movements are normal—features strongly suggest acute ureteral colic.
persona_chinese: 她近期突然出现右侧腰背部剧烈疼痛，排尿时有肉眼血尿。无发热、无恶心呕吐，排便正常；整体临床表现高度提示急性肾绞痛或输尿管结石。

persona: At 51, asymptomatic yet flagged on screening: a ~1 cm right mid‑pole renal mass on contrast-enhanced CT, present over a month; diagnosis confirmed, with surgical resection advised and next steps under consideration.
persona_chinese: 51岁男性，无症状，体检发现右肾中极约1cm占位，已1个多月。增强CT证实右肾肿物，考虑肾肿瘤；医生建议手术切除，正评估下一步方案。

persona: A 63-year-old man with a 2–2.3 cm right renal mass discovered 2 weeks ago, asymptomatic; arterially hyperenhancing with venous washout, restricted diffusion, cortical indentation, partial renal sinus protrusion, intact capsule—imaging favors clear cell RCC.
persona_chinese: 63岁男性，右肾约2.0–2.3 cm占位，发现2周，无症状；动脉期明显强化、静脉/髓质期减退，弥散受限，压迫皮质并部分突入肾窦，包膜完整，影像倾向透明细胞癌。

persona: At 60, he reports a 5-year progression of voiding difficulty dominated by hesitancy and obstructive LUTS, minimal nocturia, no frequency or urgency. Doxazosin offers only partial relief, prompting him to seek more effective therapy.
persona_chinese: 60岁男性，5年来排尿困难逐渐加重，以尿等待为主的梗阻性下尿路症状；夜尿0–1次，无尿频、尿急。多沙唑嗪仅部分缓解，现寻求更有效的治疗方案。

persona: Now 58, he describes several weeks of isolated nocturia—3–4 nightly awakenings to void—without urgency, dysuria, or daytime frequency. Sleep is fragmented. He seeks management options, wondering about benign prostatic hyperplasia versus nocturnal polyuria.
persona_chinese: 58岁，近几周出现孤立性夜尿，每晚起夜3–4次；无尿急、尿痛，白天无尿频。睡眠被反复打断。他想寻求治疗方案，担心良性前列腺增生或夜间多尿。

persona: At 26, she is asymptomatic, incidentally found two months ago to have a left renal upper‑pole mass (~4×8×6 cm), partly exophytic with fat density and heterogeneous enhancement; perinephric fat stranding suggests angiomyolipoma prone to hemorrhage.
persona_chinese: 26岁女性，无症状；两月前体检偶然发现左肾上极包块，约4×8×6 cm，部分外生，含脂肪密度，增强不均匀，周围脂肪间隙模糊；影像学提示血管平滑肌脂肪瘤，有出血风险。

persona: He seeks guidance after two years of hematuria; PSA 0.8 ng/mL. MRI: BPH bulging into bladder and right peripheral-zone PI-RADS 3 focus; biopsy confirms Gleason 3+3 adenocarcinoma. Hypertension on nifedipine (135/90), TIA 3 years ago.
persona_chinese: 他因血尿持续逾两年前来求治；PSA 0.8 ng/mL。MRI示前列腺增生向膀胱底突出，右周围带PI-RADS 3灶；穿刺证实前列腺腺癌Gleason 3+3。既往高血压服硝苯地平（约135/90），三年前有TIA。

persona: At 77, he has endured years of lower urinary tract symptoms—hesitancy, weak stream, straining, frequency, urgency, and recurrent nocturia—while remaining afebrile. The pattern suggests benign prostatic hyperplasia causing bladder outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 77岁，他多年饱受下尿路症状：排尿迟缓、尿线细、排尿费力、尿频、尿急、夜尿增多；体温正常。整体指向前列腺增生所致膀胱出口梗阻。

persona: At 43, uncircumcised with redundant yet retractable foreskin, he reports several days of pruritic erythema limited to the glans. Daily cleansing failed; presentation points to balanitis—candidal or irritant etiologies.
persona_chinese: 43岁男性，未行包皮环切，包皮过长但可上翻，近几日龟头红斑伴瘙痒。每日清洗仍无缓解；表现倾向龟头炎/包皮龟头炎，可能为念珠菌或刺激性。

persona: At 51, he reports recent lower urinary tract symptoms—frequency, urgency, hesitancy, weak, narrow stream, and incomplete emptying—with nocturia twice nightly. MRI confirms BPH (39×54×53 mm); PSA 5.547 ng/mL, PVR 60 mL, IPSS 33.
persona_chinese: 年过五十的他近期出现明显下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、排尿等待、尿流细弱、排尿不尽，夜尿两次。MRI示前列腺增生（39×54×53mm）；PSA 5.547ng/ml，PVR 60ml，IPSS 33分。

persona: At 59, she has 2 days of left flank pain, now 39.1°C fever with HR 109 and one vomit. CT: left mid-ureteral stone with hydronephrosis. Labs show leukocyturia, neutrophilia, thrombocytopenia; CRP 9.38, PCT 0.04.
persona_chinese: 59岁，她左侧腰背痛2天，今起高热39.1°C、心率109，恶心并呕吐一次。CT示左侧输尿管中段结石致积水。实验室：尿白细胞增多、中性偏高、血小板83；CRP 9.38，PCT 0.04。

persona: At 68, a year of rising PSA and LUTS—hesitancy after holding urine, frequency, split stream, dribbling—without urgency, dysuria, or hematuria; nocturia 0–1x. Partial response to doxazosin and Chinese patent medicine; BPH versus malignancy remains.
persona_chinese: 他68岁，PSA一年持续升高；梗阻性下尿路症状：憋尿后排尿困难、日间尿频、尿线分叉、尿后滴沥；无尿急、尿痛或肉眼血尿，夜尿0–1次。改用多沙唑嗪及中成药后部分缓解；良性前列腺增生与恶性肿瘤需鉴别。

persona: An octogenarian male reports several months of bothersome LUTS—hesitancy with delayed initiation, frequency, urgency, and waiting—without dysuria or hematuria. Otherwise well: stable weight, preserved appetite, normal bowel function and sleep.
persona_chinese: 年逾八旬男性，数月来出现明显下尿路症状：起尿迟缓与尿等待、排尿困难，伴尿频尿急；无血尿、无排尿疼痛。精神体力尚可，食欲佳，体重稳定，睡眠与大便正常。

persona: Seventy-year-old man enduring six months of obstructive lower urinary tract symptoms and urinary difficulty; MRI confirms benign prostatic hyperplasia, PSA 10.4. On doxazosin; symptoms notably improved after adding silodosin. Seeking guidance on next-step management.
persona_chinese: 这位70岁男性，半年来以排尿困难为主的梗阻性下尿路症状。MRI提示前列腺增生，PSA 10.4。服用多沙唑嗪，加用优利福后症状好转，正寻求下一步治疗方案。

persona: He’s 26 with a long, redundant foreskin; over the past two days he’s noticed abundant whitish subpreputial discharge and glans discomfort, suggesting smegma buildup with early balanitis, possibly candidal, on a background of partial phimosis.
persona_chinese: 26岁，包皮明显过长；近两日包皮内白色分泌物增多并伴龟头不适，提示包皮垢堆积与早期龟头炎，可能为念珠菌感染，亦考虑轻度包茎背景。

persona: At 57, he reports recent, progressively worsening lower urinary tract symptoms—hesitancy with prolonged initiation, weak stream, urinary frequency and urgency; IPSS 22 denotes severe LUTS, pointing toward benign prostatic hyperplasia.
persona_chinese: 他57岁，近期下尿路症状逐步加重：排尿踌躇、起始时间延长、尿流细弱，伴尿频尿急；IPSS 22分提示症状重度，临床倾向良性前列腺增生。

persona: He is 52, recently evaluated externally: PSA 2.93 ng/mL; ultrasound shows mild prostatic enlargement with post‑void residual 26 mL. No urinary symptoms reported, yet worried about benign prostatic hyperplasia and management.
persona_chinese: 他52岁，近期在外院检查：PSA 2.93 ng/ml，B超示前列腺轻度增生，膀胱残余尿26 ml。未诉明显排尿症状，但心存担忧，寻求良性前列腺增生的治疗方案。

persona: He reports a >2‑month persistent PSA surge to 936 ng/mL. MRI shows enlarged, heterogeneous prostate with central‑zone nodules and 9–11 o’clock peripheral lesions. Biopsy cores 6–14 harbor adenocarcinoma, Gleason 4+4=8 (ISUP 4/5). PET‑CT favors right‑sided dominance.
persona_chinese: 近两月PSA持续飙升至936 ng/mL。MRI示前列腺增大、信号不均，中央带结节及9–11点周围带病灶。穿刺6–14针提示腺癌，Gleason 4+4=8，ISUP 4/5；PET‑CT提示右侧优势。

persona: At 65, he has developed over recent weeks bothersome LUTS: frequency, urgency, incomplete emptying, and nocturia 3-4 times nightly, disrupting sleep and pointing to benign prostatic hyperplasia.
persona_chinese: 他65岁，近几周出现明显下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、排尿不尽，夜尿每晚3-4次，严重干扰睡眠，整体表现提示良性前列腺增生可能。

persona: At 75 and 2.5 years post-HoLEP, he voids robustly yet notes a persistent split urinary stream. No incontinence, gross hematuria, urgency, frequency, dysuria, or fever; seeking management for this isolated issue.
persona_chinese: 75岁，HoLEP术后2年半；排尿通畅，却持续出现尿流分叉。无尿失禁、肉眼血尿、尿急、尿频、尿痛或发热；就这一单一问题寻求处理方案。

persona: Two days of right flank pain and fevers to 39.9°C. CT confirms proximal right ureteral stone with hydronephrosis, perirenal exudation. Labs: PCT 15.99, CRP 340, neutrophils 94.5%, glucose 13.1; tachycardic, hypertensive; with heart failure, CAD.
persona_chinese: 她两天右侧腰痛并高热至39.9℃；CT示右侧输尿管起始段结石、上尿路积水、肾周渗出。化验：降钙素原15.99、CRP340、N 94.5%、血糖13.1；心动过速、血压偏高；既往心衰、冠心病。

persona: Midlife man, 45, with lifelong redundant prepuce (long foreskin); he can’t tell if this represents phimosis or simple excess skin and asks whether circumcision is medically indicated now, absent stated complications.
persona_chinese: 45岁男性，自幼包皮过长，拿不准属包茎还是单纯包皮冗长；未提及反复感染或疼痛，咨询此时是否需要行包皮环切及其适应证。

persona: She’s a 24-year-old woman, 3 months post incidental discovery of a 2.4 cm left renal hilar mass: mild FDG uptake, arterial enhancement with venous washout; ccRCC suspected, pedicle micro-nodes questionable; bilateral tiny fat-signal nodules.
persona_chinese: 24岁女性，体检3个月前偶发现左肾近肾门约2.4cm肿块；FDG轻度增高，动脉期不均匀强化、静脉期明显衰减；倾向透明细胞癌，肾蒂微小淋巴结可疑；双肾多发小脂肪信号结节。

persona: Recently flagged by screening, a 61-year-old man shows PSA 7.234 ng/mL; his free-to-total PSA ratio is low at 14%, raising malignancy concern despite no reported LUTS, and he seeks management guidance.
persona_chinese: 近期筛查提示，一名61岁男性PSA升至7.234 ng/ml；游离/总PSA比值仅14%，虽无明显下尿路症状，仍担忧恶性风险，正寻求分层评估与下一步治疗方案。

persona: At 57, he had BPH-related LUTS, underwent Rezūm 3 months ago; now enjoys a strong stream and unobstructed voiding without irritative symptoms. Seeks guidance on follow-up and whether ongoing medication or further intervention is needed.
persona_chinese: 57岁，因良性前列腺增生(BPH)相关下尿路症状(LUTS)于3个月前行Rezūm治疗；现自述尿流有力、排尿通畅，无明显刺激症状。希望明确随访安排，以及是否需继续用药或进一步干预。

persona: He is 67, troubled by nocturia and a two-year left perineal fullness that eases post-void. No renal colic, nausea/vomiting, or back pain. Seeking guidance for lower urinary tract symptoms.
persona_chinese: 67岁男性，夜尿增多，左侧会阴部胀满持续2年，排尿后缓解。无肾绞痛、恶心呕吐或腰背痛。希望获得下尿路症状的评估与治疗建议。

persona: At 66, he reports a year of painless LUTS: hesitancy, weak and slow stream, occasional incomplete emptying, and nocturia 4–5 times with normal volumes. Pattern strongly suggests benign prostatic hyperplasia.
persona_chinese: 66岁男性，一年余无痛性下尿路症状：起始迟缓、尿流细弱缓慢，间有排尿不尽，夜尿4–5次且每次尿量尚可；整体表现高度提示良性前列腺增生。

persona: Hypertensive 66-year-old man on telmisartan/HCTZ; PSA persistently high (49→50 ng/mL over 3 months). Biopsy confirms prostate adenocarcinoma, Gleason 4+3=7. PET-CT: enlarged, FDG-avid gland with calcifications. History: right hip arthroplasty, left clavicle plating, back lipoma excision.
persona_chinese: 66岁男性，20年高血压，口服替米沙坦氢氯噻嗪。PSA持续升高（49→50 ng/ml，3个月）。活检示前列腺腺癌，Gleason 4+3=7。PET-CT示腺体增大、FDG高代谢并见钙化；既往右髋置换、左锁骨钢板、背部脂肪瘤切除。

persona: Two weeks of urinary frequency and urgency plague a 79-year-old man. Despite PSA 2.98 ng/mL, MRI detects a PI‑RADS 4 prostate nodule, prompting concern for clinically significant malignancy and management planning.
persona_chinese: 近半月反复尿频、尿急困扰一名79岁男性。PSA 2.98 ng/mL，MRI发现前列腺PI‑RADS 4级结节，担忧临床意义性前列腺癌，正寻求合适的管理与治疗。

persona: Five days after percutaneous nephrolithotomy with a nephrostomy, this 58-year-old man reports sudden bright-red drainage from the tube and difficulty voiding with a blocked sensation—concerning for clot retention and delayed postoperative vascular bleeding.
persona_chinese: 经皮肾镜取石术后第5天，58岁男性留置肾造瘘，造瘘管突现鲜红色引流，伴排尿困难与梗阻感；表现提示血块潴留及延迟性术后血管性出血。

persona: A 53-year-old woman reporting recent-onset dysuria with a burning, cramping quality and concurrent stress urinary incontinence; afebrile, without chest tightness, suggesting uncomplicated lower urinary tract involvement without systemic features.
persona_chinese: 她为53岁女性，近期出现灼痛性排尿并合并压力性尿失禁；无发热、无胸闷，提示以下尿路受累为主，尚无全身感染征象。

persona: At 53, he presents with steadily worsening LUTS—hesitancy, delayed start, weak stream, frequency and urgency—and nocturia 2–3 times nightly; concerned it indicates advancing benign prostatic hyperplasia.
persona_chinese: 53岁男性，近期下尿路症状逐步加重：尿等待、起始延迟、尿流无力、尿频尿急，夜尿2–3次；他担心这提示良性前列腺增生在进展。

persona: A 65-year-old man under follow-up for benign prostatic hyperplasia now reports new-onset, storage-predominant LUTS—urinary frequency, urgency, and increased nocturia—without dysuria, hematuria, back/flank pain, fever, chills, or abdominal complaints; seeking management advice.
persona_chinese: 65岁男性，前列腺增生复诊；近期出现以储尿症状为主的LUTS：尿频、尿急、夜尿增多。无尿痛、血尿、腰背/肋区痛，亦无发热、畏寒/寒战或腹部不适；希望获得治疗建议。

persona: At 34 and asymptomatic, she’s had a left renal mass for six months: ultrasound 98×67 mm high-echo; CT fat density (-75 to -42 HU); MRI favors upper-pole AML 58×37 mm; small bilateral cysts; no DM/HTN.
persona_chinese: 34岁且无症状，她左肾占位已持续半年：超声高回声98×67mm；CT呈脂肪密度(-75至-42HU)并脂肪间隙模糊；MRI倾向左肾上极血管平滑肌脂肪瘤58×37mm；伴双肾小囊肿，无糖尿病/高血压。

persona: A 72-year-old man with acute urinary retention initially managed by indwelling catheter; a day‑7 trial without catheter (TWOC) failed, prompting re-catheterization for two weeks. He seeks definitive therapy to regain spontaneous voiding.
persona_chinese: 72岁男性，急性尿潴留，先行留置导尿；第7天试行拔管（TWOC）失败，复置导尿并持续2周。现希望获得根治性治疗，恢复自主排尿并明确病因。

persona: Now 71, he returns for BPH follow-up reporting urinary frequency, urgency, and increased nocturia without dysuria or hematuria. PSA 1.67 ng/mL; MRI reveals a prostatic mass. Strong family history of prostate cancer; seeks management options.
persona_chinese: 71岁男性，他为前列腺增生复诊；诉尿频、尿急、夜尿增多，无尿痛、血尿及腰痛发热。PSA 1.67 ng/mL，MRI示前列腺占位。有前列腺癌家族史，寻求治疗方案。

persona: One month after HoLEP for obstructive BPH, he, age 68, reports a strong, unobstructed stream without dysuria and seeks guidance on medication discontinuation, pelvic-floor rehabilitation, and follow-up PSA and uroflowmetry.
persona_chinese: 行前列腺钬激光剜除术1个月后，68岁男性排尿通畅、尿流有力，无排尿痛；现咨询后续管理：既往药物是否停用、骨盆底康复训练，以及PSA与尿流率随访。

persona: A sexually active 25-year-old man with lifelong redundant, nonretractile foreskin—never able to expose the glans. Voiding and intercourse remain normal, without infections; he asks if this is phimosis and whether circumcision is needed.
persona_chinese: 25岁男性，包皮过长自幼，始终无法上翻，龟头从未外露。排尿与性生活正常，未诉疼痛或感染；现咨询是否属于包茎，以及是否需行包皮环切术。

persona: 57‑year‑old man with prior stone‑related left renal atrophy presents with right flank pain and 37.7°C fever; CT: two proximal right ureteral stones. Labs: creatinine 241, CRP 128, WBC 11.85, PCT 0.222; urine output normal.
persona_chinese: 57岁男性，既往因结石致左肾萎缩；现右侧腰痛并昨夜低热37.7℃。CT示右侧输尿管上段两枚结石。化验：肌酐241、CRP 128、白细胞11.85、PCT 0.222；自述尿量正常。

persona: Male, 53, with progressive LUTS—frequency, urgency, weak, thin stream, incomplete emptying. Severe by IPSS 26. Over 6 months, Qmax ~10–11 mL/s (VOL 265→196 mL). Prostate 51.9 mL, PVR 44 mL. Urodynamics: detrusor underactivity with BOO.
persona_chinese: 53岁男性，进行性下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、尿流细弱、排尿不尽。IPSS 26分。6个月内Qmax约10–11 mL/s（尿量265→196 mL）。前列腺约51.9 mL，残余尿44 mL。尿动力：逼尿肌收缩力减弱合并膀胱出口梗阻。

persona: A 72-year-old man reporting several days of progressively worsening voiding difficulty—marked hesitancy and weak stream—suggestive of lower urinary tract obstruction, likely BPH, and seeking therapeutic options to mitigate an emerging urinary retention risk.
persona_chinese: 72岁男性，近几日排尿困难逐步加重，表现为起始迟缓与尿流细弱；提示下尿路梗阻，倾向良性前列腺增生，担忧进展为尿潴留，亟盼合适的治疗方案。

persona: At 72, this man reports progressively worsening LUTS—hesitancy, weak stream, frequency, urgency, nocturia, and incomplete emptying. His self-administered IPSS is high, and he seeks guidance on treatment options for suspected BPH.
persona_chinese: 72岁男性，进行性下尿路症状：排尿犹豫、尿流细弱、尿频、尿急、夜尿增多、排尿不尽。自测IPSS偏高，担心良性前列腺增生，前来咨询治疗选择。

persona: At 68, he reports a one-week course of suprapubic discomfort, urinary hesitancy and weak stream with a persistent urge-to-void, suggesting incomplete bladder emptying consistent with possible bladder outlet obstruction/BPH.
persona_chinese: 68岁男性，近一周出现耻骨上区不适、排尿踟蹰与尿流变弱，持续强烈尿意难解，提示膀胱排空不全，考虑膀胱出口梗阻/良性前列腺增生可能。

persona: At 78, he reports acute-onset voiding difficulty persisting >24 hours after catheter removal. Persistent LUTS with poor urinary flow raises concern for post-catheter urinary retention and possible bladder outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 78岁，他在拔除导尿管后已超过一天仍排尿困难。下尿路症状持续、尿流差，提示拔管后尿潴留风险，不排除膀胱出口梗阻等可能。

persona: He reports a month-long PSA rise despite two weeks of bicalutamide. Post transurethral prostate vaporization and holmium lithotripsy, pathology showed acinar adenocarcinoma, Gleason 4+5=9 with 70% involvement, with BPH/calcifications; MRI abnormal with bilateral iliac nodes.
persona_chinese: 他自述PSA升高已逾1个月，2周比卡鲁胺无效。经尿道前列腺气化电切及膀胱结石钬激光术后，病理示腺泡型前列腺腺癌（Gleason 4+5=9，肿瘤约占70%）、伴增生和钙化，FDG代谢增高；MRI异常，见双侧髂旁淋巴结。

persona: Now in his seventies, he describes many years of combined storage and voiding LUTS—frequency, urgency, nocturia, hesitancy, thin weak stream, and straining. Afebrile, the pattern points toward benign prostatic outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 年逾七十的男性，长期出现储尿期与排尿期并存的下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、夜尿增多、起尿迟缓、尿线细弱、排尿费力。体温正常，整体表现提示良性前列腺出口梗阻。

persona: A 69-year-old man reporting a 2-year progression of lower urinary tract symptoms—hesitancy, weak/thin stream, nocturia, frequency, and urgency without dysuria—now seeks guidance on management options for suspected BPH-related obstruction.
persona_chinese: 69岁男性，2年来下尿路症状进行性加重：排尿迟缓、尿流细弱、夜尿增多、尿频尿急，无尿痛；现为疑似前列腺增生所致梗阻寻求治疗选择。

persona: She is a 56-year-old woman with sudden left flank/back pain for 1 day, nausea, and worsening chills without fever, seeks urgent care. CT: left UPJ stone with hydronephrosis; labs normal WBC, low procalcitonin, creatinine 88.
persona_chinese: 她，56岁女性，突发左侧腰背痛1天，恶心，畏寒寒战加重但无发热，遂就诊。CT示左侧肾盂输尿管连接处结石伴上尿路积水；WBC 7.46、N 51.6%、肌酐88、PCT 0.024。

persona: At 64, he reports recently progressive obstructive voiding with frequency and urgency; nocturia improved on medication (likely alpha-blocker) yet persists twice nightly, suggesting LUTS from BPH with only a partial pharmacologic response.
persona_chinese: 64岁，近期出现进行性排尿困难并伴尿频、尿急；用药后夜尿有所改善却仍每夜2次，考虑良性前列腺增生相关LUTS，药物反应仅部分，疗效尚不满意。

persona: Middle-aged uncircumcised man (38) reporting lifelong redundant prepuce that covers the glans at rest. Asymptomatic—no phimosis, dysuria, balanoposthitis, malodor, or painful intercourse. Normal voiding/erections; seeks guidance on circumcision necessity.
persona_chinese: 38岁未行环切，包皮过长，自小如此，静止时覆盖龟头。无症状：无包茎、排尿困难、龟头包皮炎、异味或性交疼痛。排尿与勃起正常，咨询是否需要手术。

persona: She has month-long hematuria with right ureteral lesion: PET-CT shows FDG‑avid mid‑distal thickening and hydroureteronephrosis; ureteroscopy found a 5‑cm villous mass 2 cm from the orifice, biopsy inflammatory granulation. Hypertension; GFR reduced bilaterally, right excretion obstructed.
persona_chinese: 她近1月出现肉眼血尿并发现右输尿管占位；PET‑CT示中下段FDG增高伴右侧积水；镜下距开口2cm有5cm绒毛样肿物，活检炎性肉芽；既往高血压，双肾GFR下降、右排泄受阻。

persona: At 76, he underwent laser vaporization for BPH; voiding improved post-catheter, then by week three devolved to a thin, fragmented stream, weak flow, and incontinence. Diagnosed with urethral stricture; last month’s dilation gave minimal relief.
persona_chinese: 76岁，半年前因前列腺增生行激光汽化；拔管后排尿短期通畅，第三周即出现尿流细碎、尿势弱并尿失禁。上月确诊尿道狭窄，行扩张治疗，疗效有限。

persona: At 51, he reports several weeks of worsening erectile dysfunction: reduced penile rigidity and brief maintenance during intercourse, yet intact morning erections. Preserved nocturnal penile tumescence hints at psychogenic or mixed etiology; seeks evidence-based therapy.
persona_chinese: 51岁男性，近数周出现勃起功能障碍：阴茎硬度下降、性交维持时间短，但晨勃仍在。保留的夜间勃起提示心理性或混合因素，他主动寻求循证治疗方案。

persona: At 63, he reports a year of nocturnal voiding difficulty, persistent LUTS despite concurrent tamsulosin, doxazosin, silodosin, plus eplerenone; refractory features raise concern for BPH with nocturnal outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 63岁男性，一年来夜间排尿困难、下尿路症状持续；尽管合用坦索罗辛、多沙唑嗪、赛洛多辛及爱普列特，疗效不佳。症状难治，考虑良性前列腺增生致夜间出口梗阻。

persona: At 26, he reports lifelong redundant prepuce; typically asymptomatic, yet intercourse occasionally provokes penile discomfort. No phimosis, dysuria, or recurrent balanitis noted. Seeking advice on circumcision versus conservative measures.
persona_chinese: 26岁，包皮过长，自青春期即存在；日常无症状，但性交时偶发阴茎不适。否认包茎、排尿异常、反复龟头炎；正权衡包皮环切与保守治疗的必要性。

persona: At 50, he has years of obstructive lower urinary tract symptoms; voiding difficulty has worsened in the past two months. He is seeking options for suspected benign prostatic hyperplasia to improve urinary flow.
persona_chinese: 年满50岁，他多年饱受梗阻性下尿路症状困扰，近两个月排尿不畅明显加重；为改善尿流，正寻求针对疑似良性前列腺增生的治疗方案。

persona: At 70, she has a 36‑mm exophytic mid‑left renal mass with arterial‑phase hyperenhancement for over 3 weeks, plus a 50‑mm upper‑pole cyst. Diabetes and hypertension controlled; recent toe amputation for diabetic foot necrosis; no allergies.
persona_chinese: 70岁女性，左肾中极外向36mm占位，动脉期明显强化，已发现3周余；左肾上极50mm囊肿。糖尿病、高血压控制良好；近期糖足坏疽行趾截；无过敏史。

persona: At 64, he reports severe nocturia—5–6 awakenings nightly—with persistent incomplete bladder emptying. Prostate measures 46×41×35 mm and post‑void residual is 190 mL; a left renal cyst is present. Seeks targeted relief.
persona_chinese: 年逾六十的他，近期夜尿显著，每晚起夜5–6次，并觉排尿不尽。前列腺46×41×35 mm，排尿后残余尿190 mL；同时发现左肾囊肿。期望精准缓解。

persona: One week post right-sided PCNL for nephrolithiasis, she develops sudden bright-red gross hematuria and bleeding through the nephrostomy. CT shows a right renal pelvic clot, no perirenal hematoma; PCN in place. Hb 117, Cr 95.
persona_chinese: 右侧经皮肾取石术后1周，她突发鲜红色肉眼血尿，并从肾造口引流管出血。CT示右肾盂血块，无肾周血肿；PCN在位，膀胱无血块。Hb117，Cr95。

persona: He has prostate adenocarcinoma, bilateral seminal vesicle invasion; Gleason 4+3=7. Six months of rising PSA despite apalutamide. MRI shows TZ cysts, PZ T2 low without DWI restriction; bone scan shows sacrum/right ilium/left acetabulum sclerosis.
persona_chinese: 他患前列腺腺癌，双侧精囊侵犯；Gleason 4+3=7。近6个月PSA在阿帕他胺治疗下仍上升。MRI示移行带多发囊变、外周带T2低而DWI阴性；骨显像见骶骨/右髂骨/左髋臼硬化灶。

persona: At 71, he follows up for BPH after stopping finasteride two months prior; on tamsulosin monotherapy, he reports frequency, urgency, and nocturia, without dysuria, hematuria, back or abdominal pain, fever, or chills.
persona_chinese: 71岁男性复诊前列腺增生；两月前停用非那雄胺，现单用坦索罗辛。诉尿频、尿急、夜尿增多；无尿痛、血尿，亦无腰背或腹痛、发热、寒战等全身症状。

persona: Elderly man, 86, with recent-onset storage LUTS—marked urinary frequency and urgency—without flank pain, fever/chills, or hematuria. Afebrile, clinically stable; profile suggests BPH-related irritative symptoms or overactive bladder rather than infection.
persona_chinese: 高龄男性，86岁，近期出现储尿期下尿路症状：尿频、尿急；无腰痛、发热寒战或血尿。更倾向良性前列腺增生相关刺激症状或膀胱过度活动，感染可能性低。

persona: He is 26, with lifelong redundant prepuce and a fully retractile foreskin; asymptomatic—no pain, dysuria, or infections. Prompted by a friend’s “medication-assisted” circumcision, he asks about true indications versus elective circumcision.
persona_chinese: 男性26岁，自幼包皮过长但龟头可完全外翻，平素无不适，无疼痛、排尿异常或感染。受朋友“药物辅助”包皮手术影响，咨询是否存在医学指征，或仅属择期手术。

persona: He has been anuric for two days; CT confirms bilateral ureteral stones with hydronephrosis. Afebrile, normotensive (124/82) with HR 74, yet creatinine 849 µmol/L—an obstructive post-renal AKI demanding urgent decompression (ureteral stents or nephrostomy).
persona_chinese: 他已两天无尿；CT证实双侧输尿管结石并双肾积水。无发热，血压124/82、心率74；肌酐849 µmol/L——肾后性急性肾损伤，需紧急减压（双J支架或肾造瘘）。

persona: He, a 69‑year‑old man, describes several months of storage‑predominant LUTS—urinary frequency and urgency—without dysuria or gross hematuria and no clear trigger. Anxiety with insomnia persists; mood low. Appetite intact; bowel habits normal; weight stable.
persona_chinese: 他，69岁男性，近数月出现以储尿期为主的下尿路症状：尿频、尿急；无尿痛或肉眼血尿，亦无明确诱因。伴焦虑与失眠、情绪低落；食欲尚可，排便正常，体重稳定。

persona: At 77, he reports no hematuria, fever, low back pain, nor nausea/vomiting; a recent check-up detected prostatic enlargement, suggestive of BPH, in the absence of acute urinary symptoms.
persona_chinese: 77岁男性，近期体检检出前列腺增大；他无血尿、发热、腰酸腰痛或恶心呕吐，未见急性泌尿系统症状，体征倾向良性前列腺增生。

persona: A 68-year-old man with a 4-year progression of LUTS: nocturia 4–5/night, frequency, urgency, split stream, intermittency, episodic dysuria; no gross hematuria or fever. On tamsulosin plus finasteride with modest benefit; multiple urinary retention episodes.
persona_chinese: 68岁男性，4年渐进性下尿路症状（LUTS）：夜尿每晚4–5次、尿频尿急、尿流分叉与间断，间歇性排尿痛；无肉眼血尿或发热。长期服用坦索罗辛+非那雄胺疗效一般，曾多次尿潴留。

persona: At 91, he reports recent onset of voiding difficulty and frank urinary retention. On terazosin plus finasteride; prior cerebral infarction informs risk, and he seeks individualized management of BPH-related lower urinary tract obstruction.
persona_chinese: 年届91，近来出现排尿困难与明显尿潴留。正在服用特拉唑嗪和非那雄胺；既往脑梗死，期望针对良性前列腺增生所致下尿路梗阻制定更安全、有效的个体化方案。

persona: Three days after circumcision, a 30-year-old man notes localized erythema and edema at the foreskin incision without bleeding; the gauze dressing has come off, prompting concern about immediate wound care and infection risk.
persona_chinese: 环切术后第3天，30岁男性切口处局灶性发红与肿胀，无活动性出血；包扎纱布已脱落，担心伤口即时护理及潜在感染风险。

persona: At 67, he reports two weeks of obstructive voiding and nocturia 3–4/night, no dysuria or hematuria. PSA 20 ng/mL; imaging: enlarged calcified prostate, Bosniak I cysts, mild left ureteral dilation; Foley removed; prostate MRI pending.
persona_chinese: 67岁男性，近两周排尿受阻、夜尿3–4次，无尿痛或血尿。PSA 20 ng/mL；影像示前列腺增大并钙化、双肾Bosniak I囊肿、左上段输尿管轻度扩张；导尿已拔，拟行前列腺MRI。

persona: An octogenarian man with a month-plus of lower urinary tract symptoms—frequency, urgency, marked hesitancy with prolonged initiation—alongside a left inguinal hernia; denies hematuria or dysuria, and reports stable mood, appetite, bowels, sleep, and weight.
persona_chinese: 八旬男性，近一个多月出现下尿路症状：尿频、尿急、明显排尿踟蹰、启动时间延长；伴左侧腹股沟疝。无血尿、无尿痛；情绪、胃口、排便、睡眠及体重稳定。

persona: He reports six weeks of progressive lower urinary tract symptoms—hesitancy with prolonged initiation, weak stream, frequency, urgency, and nocturia—without incontinence, fever, or back pain, raising concern for BPH-related bladder outlet obstruction.
persona_chinese: 他近六周下尿路症状渐进加重：尿等待、尿流细弱、尿频尿急及夜尿；无尿失禁、发热或腰背痛，考虑良性前列腺增生相关的膀胱出口梗阻。

persona: A 69-year-old man reports two days of acute lower urinary tract symptoms—urinary frequency and urgency—accompanied by hematuria. Worried about the cause, he seeks timely evaluation and guidance on treatment.
persona_chinese: 69岁男性，近两天出现急性下尿路症状：尿频、尿急，并伴血尿；对病因心存忧虑，正寻求尽快评估与治疗方案建议。

persona: At 64, he lives with longstanding BPH causing obstructive LUTS—hesitancy and weak stream. A recent acute urinary retention episode required temporary catheterization; now decatheterized and on medical therapy, he seeks prevention and better flow.
persona_chinese: 64岁，长期受良性前列腺增生困扰，呈阻塞性下尿路症状——排尿费力、尿流弱。近日发生急性尿潴留并短期导尿；现已拔管且用药中，寻求防复发与改善尿流方案。

persona: At 58, she endures eight years of resistant hypertension, spikes to 180/110 with dizziness and headaches. Serial CT shows bilateral adrenal adenomas (right lipid-poor), fatty liver, left-lobe hemangioma/AVF; three years of flank ache; under surveillance.
persona_chinese: 58岁女性，8年难治性高血压，最高180/110，伴头晕头痛。复查CT示双侧肾上腺腺瘤（右侧乏脂），并脂肪肝及肝左内叶小血管瘤/动静脉瘘。近3年双侧腰隐痛，持续随访观察。

persona: A 62-year-old man with known benign prostatic hyperplasia returns for follow-up, reporting recent worsening urinary frequency, urgency, and nocturia, without dysuria, hematuria, flank or abdominal pain, fever, or chills—seeking guidance on management.
persona_chinese: 62岁男性，既往诊断前列腺增生，此次复诊；近期尿频、尿急、夜尿明显增多；否认尿痛、血尿、腰背酸痛或腹胀腹痛，亦无发热、寒战或畏寒，寻求进一步治疗与管理建议。

persona: Pregnant woman in her second trimester experiencing persistent morning sickness and fatigue, seeking nutritional guidance and safe remedies to manage symptoms while ensuring fetal health.
persona_chinese: 孕中期女性，持续孕吐和疲劳，寻求营养指导和安全缓解方法，同时确保胎儿健康。

persona: Toddler with recurring ear infections over the past six months, parents concerned about antibiotic overuse and exploring preventive strategies.
persona_chinese: 幼儿，近半年反复中耳炎，家长担心抗生素过度使用，希望了解预防策略。

persona: College athlete recovering from ACL reconstruction surgery three months ago, eager to return to competitive sports but uncertain about rehabilitation timeline.
